value:
$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Follow me, and I will open the gate
to my realm.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|The realm of the divine Lord Askr...
What is it like there?$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|It would be best for you to simply
see it for yourself. I would not want
to spoil the surprise of a new realm.$k$pVisiting new worlds is a joy, after
all, and so much of that joy lies in
the act of discovery!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Lord Askr... I must ask you a
question of dire import. How can
we stop Embla? What do we need?$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Of course. It is only natural for you
to want those answers, and as
soon as possible.$k$pBut without first traveling with me
to my realm, it is likely to be difficult
for you to understand...$k$pBut I will tell you what I can.
The power you seek is—$k$p...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...Is what? Time is short.$k$pThe power to defeat Embla? Explain.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Correct. You will need to gather
that power.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|What is it? Tell us now! Alfonse said
he wanted to know, so tell us!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Veronica?$k$p$Sbs3000|$EFace_Anger|Wait—you... Veronica isn't like—
Just who are you, exactly?!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|Embla may have used many a mortal
as her puppet, but she has never
mastered the art of imitating them.$k$p$Sbs150|$EFace|It is not so easy, is it, Embla?$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE13_10,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Enemy2,Face_Smile|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh... Be difficult then,
if you must...$c255,255,255,255|$k$p

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Enemy2,Face|$c255,0,0,255|What are you planning, Askr?
What is it you think you can do?$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|I will tell you...if you vow to leave
these mortals in peace and stop
your meddling.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Enemy2,Face_Anger|$c255,0,0,255|You...hypocrite! Such falseness!
Your only way out is death!$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE16_13,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Enemy2,Face_Pain|Urgh...$k$p$c255,0,0,255|$EFace|This body...still has some fight
left within it.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|Askr... I feel it, you know... The dark
has infiltrated your being. You are
growing weak.$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Enemy2,Face|$c255,0,0,255|You have not even the strength
you would need to remove me
from this child's body.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|$EFace_Smile|You are running out of time.$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|$Fi3000|The gate is open.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Enemy2,Face|$c255,0,0,255|Ungh...$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Cool2|Come, this way. Before Embla can
follow us—through the gate!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|B-but what about Princess Veronica?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It would be my preference to be
delicate and considerate of your
feelings given the circumstance...$k$pand I deeply regret having to say
this, but Veronica is not our priority
at the moment, Princess Sharena!$k$pThe fact of th— We must hurry!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Cool|Forgive me, Veronica... I will come
back for you. I promise.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We will be back, and we'll have the
divine might of Askr behind us!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Urgh...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Normal2|Hmph... Such frailness.$k$pSo small, so weak...I cannot kill
Askr in this body...$k$p$EFace_Smile|I will awaken the power of my blood
in you, child...$k$pBlood within this vessel...stir.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Now, receive my power!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo2000,255,0,0,255|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi2000|Urgh...$k$pAaah...$k$pAAAGGGH!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo2000,255,0,0,255|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|$Fi2000|...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Smile|Hm-hm-hmh... It is done.$k$pNow I will take control of your body,
and Askr and all the others will
die at your hand.$k$pOr maybe I'll force your friends to kill
you... That may be entertaining...$k$p$EFace_Cool|Hm-hm-hmh... Hm-hm-hmh-ha-hah!$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|B-Brother...$k$p$Sbs150|
